channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Media Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Media Server

item.title: CVE-2022-22683|2024-08-03T03:21:48.996Z -- synology -- media%20server
item.description: Buffer copy without checking size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in cgi component in Synology Media Server before 1.8.1-2876 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.
